info.name: Paybook Sync
info.description:
# Introduction
What does your API do?

# Overview
Things that the developers should know about

# Authentication
What is the preferred way of using the API?

# Error Codes


| Code |                       | Description |
| ---- | --------------------- | ----------- |
| 400  | Bad Request           |             |
| 401  | Unauthorized          |             |
| 402  | Payment Required      |             |
| 403  | Forbidden             |             |
| 404  | Not Found             |             |
| 429  | Too Many Requests     |             |
| 500  | Internal Server Error |             |
| 503  | Service Unavailable   |             |

# Rate limit
Is there a limit to the number of requests an user can send?

item.name: Taxpayers
Get the list of the registered taxpayers for the user

query.description: The RFC of the taxpayer e.g.(AAA010101AAA)
Certificate of the taxpayer (string encoded in base64)
Key of the certificate (string encoded in base64)
Password of the cer and key

item.description: With these endpoint you can add or edit taxpayers that will be able to emit invoices

query.description: JSON structure of the invoice
XML string (base64 encoded)
(optional) Id or name of the available providers in Sync

request.description: Stamp a new invoice, you can send the JSON structure or XML string

response.name: Stamp a new invoice, you can send the JSON structure or XML string

query.description: JSON structure of the invoice
XML string (base64 encoded)
(optional) Id or name of the available providers in Sync
